import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns 
%matplotlib inline
source.84ad5da6:

                     sheet_name='HR_Employee_Data',  #update name of sheet to file uploaded
                     )  
df

sns.kdeplot(df['number_project'])

source.f6b85aa4:
sns.FacetGrid(df,hue="salary",height=5)\
             .map(sns.kdeplot,"satisfaction_level")\
             .add_legend()
plt.ioff()

#notice that people who have left have lower satisfaction levels
source.18d0e949:

             .map(sns.kdeplot,"satisfaction_level")\
             .add_legend()
plt.ioff()

#notice that people who have left have lower satisfaction levels
